name: Nitya Narasimhan
role: Senior Program Manager, Cloud+AI Developer Relations
bio: Nitya is a PhD and Polymath with 20+ years of software development and research experience across industry and startups. Her interests span mobile and web development, machine learning, community and developer advocacy. She is currently a Senior PM on the Cloud+AI Developer Relations Team at Microsoft, helping a new generation of developers go from technology awareness to actionable learning. She is a frequent speaker and sketch-noter interested in finding better ways to share stories, create meaningful connections and promote self-care.
